title: The Kid's Guide to Louie the Labrador Retriever
description: Hi my name is Louie. I am a Labrador Retriever. I am chomping at the bone for a new adventure. I was born in Canada, but moved to the United States of America looking for my new home. Every kid deserves a best friend and there is enough love in my heart for an entire family. Have you seen my ball?
author: A.J.   Richards
